review.title: “Great place to work during college.”
review.pros: Pros – Flexible with working hours, whatever times suit you and as many or as few shifts as you like. Good pay for college students in Ireland.
review.cons: Cons – No integration of field team with the rest of the company. No insight into how data is analysed or what clients' goals are. Does not give field staff a holistic view of the organisation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give field staff a more holistic induction to the company. I.e. do not just show them how to conduct interviews and use equipment etc. Give them a presentation on the history of the company and it's current strategy / targets.
